amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 1604, relating to the LHA 7 amphibious warship program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 63 printed in House Report 112-88 to strike section 1604, Budget Item Relating to LHA7 Ship Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 241 (Roll no. 368).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 241 (Roll no. 368).
